definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Then, Hush Puppies shoes sales began to increase ceaselessly.
sentences.chinese: 于是，暇步士运动鞋的销量开始不断增加。

sentences.english: I want a pair of Nikes.
sentences.chinese: 我要买一双耐克运动鞋。

sentences.english: I remember he wore sneakers and no tie.
sentences.chinese: 我记得他穿著运动鞋，没有系领带。

sentences.english: Bring security allocation such as kneecap and cuff etc usually, and wear sneakers.
sentences.chinese: 随身带上安全配置和护膝护腕等，并穿运动鞋。

sentences.english: And this way's more like the shopping area, popular for shoes and trainers.
sentences.chinese: 那条路更像购物区，因运动鞋和跑鞋而出名。

sentences.english: The Cheap nike shoes costless fast suit is severely an extraordinary sneaker.
sentences.chinese: 快速的西装是免费的耐克运动鞋严重不寻常的。

sentences.english: The dialog takes place at a sports shoe company called Stratos.
sentences.chinese: 对话发生在一个叫做Stratos运动鞋厂。

sentences.english: I do a long warm-up before the practice begins, a 20-minute warm-up, and that’s when I first wear them during the warm up.
sentences.chinese: 那是我在热身运动时第一次穿上新的运动鞋。

sentences.english: PUMA is the first sports shoe manufacture to offer Velcro fasteners.
sentences.chinese: PUMA是首家采用粘扣带的运动鞋生产商。

sentences.english: Yep, instead of hemming and hawing, just grab your tennis shoes and go for a run.
sentences.chinese: 对，别磨磨唧唧的了，把运动鞋抓过来去跑步吧。

sentences.english: Jim says sneakers are ideal for hiking.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆说运动鞋是徙步旅行最佳的选择。

sentences.english: Their only shoes were the sneakers on their feet.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩唯一的鞋子便是脚上所穿的运动鞋。

sentences.english: To buy sports shoes should first identify the quality of the shoes.
sentences.chinese: 购买运动鞋时应先鉴定鞋子的优劣。

sentences.english: They also make great athletic footwear for sports and work-outs.
sentences.chinese: 它们也使伟大的体育工作和运动鞋超时。

sentences.english: True, some elite marathoners do run sans sneakers.
sentences.chinese: 当然，有些马拉松好手确实穿胶底运动鞋跑步。
